text: John Howard (1863-1911) was Conservative MP for Faversham. He was returned unopposed in 1900, but lost to the Liberals in 1906. ==Sources== *Craig, F.W.S. British Parliamentary Election Results 1885-1918 *Whitaker's Almanack, 1901 to 1907 editions *Leigh Rayment's Historical List of MPs Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:Politics of Kent Category:1863 births Category:1911 deaths
title: John Howard (MP for Faversham)
